data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of the “ Haenydra ” lineage (Coleoptera: Hydraenidae) from the Republic of Macedonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stanković, Vlatka Mičetić, Jäch, Manfred A. (2012): Description of a new species of the “ Haenydra ” lineage (Coleoptera: Hydraenidae) from the Republic of Macedonia. Zootaxa 3503: 82-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212904
